markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Bastet (The Sly Enchantress)](/Deities.aspx?ID=50)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="CN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 124 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Ancient Osirian Gods
](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=3)

**Edicts** Learn secrets, tempt others into revelry, kill harmful snakes and evil spirits, heal diseases

**Anathema** Kill or abuse a house cat, abandon a child, choose to marry

**Follower Alignments**
N, CG, CN

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Intelligence or Charisma

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5)

**Favored Weapon** [claw](/Weapons.aspx?ID=1) or [Tekko-Kagi](/Weapons.aspx?ID=304)

**Domains** [Nature](/Domains.aspx?ID=22), [Passion](/Domains.aspx?ID=25), [Protection](/Domains.aspx?ID=27), [Trickery](/Domains.aspx?ID=31)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Pest Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=217)
(cats only)

- **3rd**
[Animal Vision](/Spells.aspx?ID=12)

- **4th**
[Private Sanctum](/Spells.aspx?ID=235)

</column>
name: Bastet (The Sly Enchantress)
